message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it!  However, I'm really trying to stay within a budget of $100. Would you be willing to go down to $100?  I think we can work something out that benefits both of us.
I understand that you're on a tight budget, Bob. However, I have to make a profit, so I can only go down to $105. Would you be willing to meet me at $105?
